docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
Welcome to opensource @IOcrafts — your gateway to innovative, community-driven software solutions. At IOcrafts, we believe in the power of open source: making our code freely available so anyone can use, modify, and contribute to our projects. This approach fosters collaboration, transparency, and rapid innovation, benefiting both developers and organizations of all sizes.

Explore our collection of open-source software below. Each project is accompanied by a direct link, so you can dive into the code, join the community, or start using our tools right away. We invite you to explore, contribute, and help us build a better software ecosystem together. Open source is not just about code — it's about community and shared progress.

  • Puppetchef

    A command-line tool to execute web automation recipes in YAML format.

    Getting started

    On npm

  • hsftp

    A command-line tool for secure file transfer operations, written in Haskell.

    Getting started

    On Hackage
